%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stlmstrackfirstscan
AS
SELECT 

LoadID as lms_track_loadid
,OpenDt as lms_track_firstscan
,l.masterloadid as lms_loads_masterloadid

FROM ssttrackunion t
LEFT JOIN dboloads l on l.id = t.LoadID
WHERE t.TrackTypeID = 2
AND lms_track_firstscan = 1
AND l.masterloadid IS NOT NULL

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stlmstracklastscan
AS
SELECT 

LoadID as lms_track_loadid
, OpenDt as lms_track_lastscan

FROM ssttrackunion t
LEFT JOIN dboloads l on l.id = t.LoadID
WHERE t.TrackTypeID = 2
AND lms_track_lastscan = 1
AND l.masterloadid IS NOT NULL

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stlmstrackscantime
AS
SELECT

t1.lms_track_loadid
,t1.lms_loads_masterloadid
,t1.lms_track_firstscan
,t2.lms_track_lastscan
,(to_unix_timestamp(t2.lms_track_lastscan)-to_unix_timestamp(t1.lms_track_firstscan)) as lms_track_loadtime

FROM stlmstrackfirstscan t1
LEFT JOIN stlmstracklastscan t2 on t2.lms_track_loadid = t1.lms_track_loadid

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stdriverpay
AS
SELECT
    d.id as tms_driverpay_id
    ,d.routeid as tms_driverpay_routeid
    ,d.triprate as tms_driverpay_triprate
    ,d.mealrate as tms_driverpay_mealrate
    ,d.linkrate as tms_driverpay_linkrate
    ,d.sleepoverrate as tms_driverpay_sleepoverrate
    ,d.numsleepover as tms_driverpay_numsleepover
    ,d.nummeal as tms_driverpay_nummeal
    ,to_timestamp(d.validfromdate) as tms_driverpay_validfromdate
    ,to_timestamp(d.validtodate) as tms_driverpay_validtodate
    ,to_timestamp(d.insdate) as tms_driverpay_insdate
    ,to_timestamp(d.moddate) as tms_driverpay_moddate
    ,d.insby as tms_driverpay_insby
    ,d.airtimerate as tms_driverpay_airtimerate
    ,d.status as tms_driverpay_status
    ,d.legacyid as tms_driverpay_legacyid
FROM publicdriverpay d

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stfuelcard
AS
SELECT

    f.id as tms_fuelcard_id
    ,f.eid as tms_fuelcard_eid
    ,f.entity as tms_fuelcard_entity
    ,f.baseprice as tms_fuelcard_baseprice
    ,f.routeid as tms_fuelcard_routeid
    ,f.operatingpercentage as tms_fuelcard_operatingpercentage
    ,to_timestamp(f.insdate) as tms_fuelcard_insdate
    ,to_timestamp(f.activefromdate) as tms_fuelcard_activefromdate
    ,to_timestamp(f.activetodate) as tms_fuelcard_activetodate
    ,to_timestamp(f.moddate) as tms_fuelcard_moddate
    ,f.status as tms_fuelcard_status
    ,f.insby as tms_fuelcard_insby
    ,f.zoneid as tms_fuelcard_zoneid
    ,f.legacyid as tms_fuelcard_legacyid

FROM publicfuelcard f

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stfuelzone
AS
SELECT

    f.id as tms_fuelzone_id
    ,f.zonename as tms_fuelzone_zonename
    ,f.rulingprice as tms_fuelzone_rulingprice
    ,to_timestamp(f.insdate) as tms_fuelzone_insdate
    ,to_timestamp(f.moddate) as tms_fuelzone_moddate
    ,f.insby as tms_fuelzone_insby
    ,f.lastrulingprice as tms_fuelzone_lastrulingprice
    ,f.legacyid as tms_fuelzone_legacyid

FROM publicfuelzone f

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stfuelzonehistory
AS
SELECT

    f.id as tms_fuelzonehistory_id
    ,f.zoneid as tms_fuelzonehistory_zoneid
    ,f.rulingprice as tms_fuelzonehistory_rulingprice
    ,f.validfromdate as tms_fuelzonehistory_validfromdate
    ,f.validtodate as tms_fuelzonehistory_validtodate
    ,f.editby as tms_fuelzonehistory_editby
    ,to_timestamp(f.insdate) as tms_fuelzonehistory_insdate
    ,to_timestamp(f.moddate) as tms_fuelzonehistory_moddate


FROM publicfuelzonehistory f

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stratecomponent
AS
SELECT

    r.id as tms_ratecomponent_id
    ,r.profileid as tms_ratecomponent_profileid
    ,r.ratetype as tms_ratecomponent_ratetype
    ,r.amount as tms_ratecomponent_amount
    ,r.applyfuellevy as tms_ratecomponent_applyfuellevy
    ,r.note as tms_ratecomponent_note
    ,to_timestamp(r.insdate) as tms_ratecomponent_insdate
    ,to_timestamp(r.moddate) as tms_ratecomponent_moddate
    ,r.insby as tms_ratecomponent_insby
    ,r.legacyid as tms_ratecomponent_legacyid


FROM publicratecomponent r

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
strateprofile
AS
SELECT

    r.id as tms_rateprofile_id
    ,r.eid as tms_rateprofile_eid
    ,r.entity as tms_rateprofile_entity
    ,r.trailersize as tms_rateprofile_trailersize
    ,r.routeid as tms_rateprofile_routeid
    ,r.profiletype as tms_rateprofile_profiletype
    ,to_timestamp(r.fromdate) as tms_rateprofile_fromdate
    ,to_timestamp(r.todate) as tms_rateprofile_todate
    ,r.insby as tms_rateprofile_insby
    ,r.status as tms_rateprofile_status
    ,to_timestamp(r.insdate) as tms_rateprofile_insdate
    ,to_timestamp(r.moddate) as tms_rateprofile_moddate
    ,r.note as tms_rateprofile_note
    ,r.legacyid as tms_rateprofile_legacyid
    ,r.usedfuelprice as tms_rateprofile_usedfuelprice

FROM publicrateprofile r

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
sttmslist
AS
SELECT

    s.id as tms_list_id
    ,s.slug as tms_list_slug
    ,s.valuetype as tms_list_valuetype
    ,s.descr as tms_list_descr
    ,to_timestamp(s.insdate) as tms_list_insdate
    ,to_timestamp(s.moddate) as tms_list_moddate
    ,s.refcols as tms_list_refcols
    ,s.editable  as tms_list_editable 
    ,s2.id as tms_listitem_id
    ,s2.lid as tms_listitem_lid
    ,s2.itemlabel as tms_listitem_itemlabel
    ,s2.itemvalue as tms_listitem_itemvalue
    ,s2.sort as tms_listitem_sort
    ,s2.mdid as tms_listitem_mdid

FROM publicselist s
LEFT JOIN publicselistitem s2 on s2.lid = s.id

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stprimarycustomer
AS
SELECT
    c.id as tms_customer_id
    ,c.status as tms_customer_status
    ,c.name as tms_customer_name
    ,c.parentid as tms_customer_parentid
    ,c.accountnumber as tms_customer_accountnumber
    ,c.revenuecode as tms_customer_revenuecode
    ,to_timestamp(c.insdate) as tms_customer_insdate
    ,to_timestamp(c.moddate) as tms_customer_moddate
    ,c.insby as tms_customer_insby
    ,c.opaqueid as tms_customer_opaqueid
    ,c.email as tms_customer_email
    ,c.areacode as tms_customer_areacode
    ,c.mobilenum as tms_customer_mobilenum
    ,c.legacyid as tms_customer_legacyid
    ,c.billingmethod as tms_customer_billingmethod
    ,c.adjustmetric as tms_customer_adjustmetric
    ,c.adjustvalue as tms_customer_adjustvalue
    ,c.adjustnegativeallowed as tms_customer_adjustnegativeallowed
    ,c.adjustvalueusingprevmonth as tms_customer_adjustvalueusingprevmonth
    ,c.excludefromnotinvoicedreport as tms_customer_excludefromnotinvoicedreport
    ,c.logictype as tms_customer_logictype
    ,c.minliability as tms_customer_minliability
 
FROM publiccustomer c
WHERE c.parentid is null

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stsecondarycustomer
AS
SELECT
    c.id as tms_customer_id
    ,c.status as tms_customer_status
    ,c.name as tms_customer_name
    ,c.parentid as tms_customer_parentid
    ,c.accountnumber as tms_customer_accountnumber
    ,c.revenuecode as tms_customer_revenuecode
    ,to_timestamp(c.insdate) as tms_customer_insdate
    ,to_timestamp(c.moddate) as tms_customer_moddate
    ,c.insby as tms_customer_insby
    ,c.opaqueid as tms_customer_opaqueid
    ,c.email as tms_customer_email
    ,c.areacode as tms_customer_areacode
    ,c.mobilenum as tms_customer_mobilenum
    ,c.legacyid as tms_customer_legacyid
    ,c.billingmethod as tms_customer_billingmethod
    ,c.adjustmetric as tms_customer_adjustmetric
    ,c.adjustvalue as tms_customer_adjustvalue
    ,c.adjustnegativeallowed as tms_customer_adjustnegativeallowed
    ,c.adjustvalueusingprevmonth as tms_customer_adjustvalueusingprevmonth
    ,c.excludefromnotinvoicedreport as tms_customer_excludefromnotinvoicedreport
    ,c.logictype as tms_customer_logictype
    ,c.minliability as tms_customer_minliability
 
FROM publiccustomer c
WHERE c.parentid is not null

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stthirdparty
AS
SELECT
    t.id as tms_thirdparty_id
    ,t.name as tms_thirdparty_name
    ,t.areacode as tms_thirdparty_areacode
    ,t.telnumber as tms_thirdparty_telnumber
    ,t.mobareacode as tms_thirdparty_mobareacode
    ,t.mobnumer as tms_thirdparty_mobnumer
    ,t.contact as tms_thirdparty_contact
    ,t.address as tms_thirdparty_address
    ,t.streetno as tms_thirdparty_streetno
    ,t.zipcode as tms_thirdparty_zipcode
    ,t.city as tms_thirdparty_city
    ,t.province as tms_thirdparty_province
    ,t.status as tms_thirdparty_status
    ,t.mdvoid as tms_thirdparty_mdvoid
    ,t.registration as tms_thirdparty_registration
    ,t.email as tms_thirdparty_email
    ,t.accnumber as tms_thirdparty_accnumber
    ,to_timestamp(t.insdate) as tms_thirdparty_insdate
    ,to_timestamp(t.moddate) as tms_thirdparty_moddate
    ,t.gitstatus as tms_thirdparty_gitstatus
    ,t.legacyid as tms_thirdparty_legacyid
    ,t.lat as tms_thirdparty_lat
    ,t.lng as tms_thirdparty_lng
    ,t.note as tms_thirdparty_note
    ,t.revenuecode as tms_thirdparty_revenuecode
    ,t.country as tms_thirdparty_country

FROM publicthirdparty t

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stparentroute
AS
SELECT
    r.id as tms_parentroute_id
    ,r.name as tms_parentroute_name
    ,r.slug as tms_parentroute_slug
    ,r.parentroute as tms_parentroute_parentroute
    ,to_timestamp(r.insdate) as tms_parentroute_insdate
    ,to_timestamp(r.moddate) as tms_parentroute_moddate
    ,r.insby as tms_parentroute_insby
    ,r.status as tms_parentroute_status
    ,r.crossborder as tms_parentroute_crossborder
    ,r.roundtripdays as tms_parentroute_roundtripdays
    ,r.distance as tms_parentroute_distance
    ,r.duration as tms_parentroute_duration
    ,r.numofuse as tms_parentroute_numofuse
    ,r.legacyid as tms_parentroute_legacyid
    ,r.local as tms_parentroute_local

FROM publicroute r
WHERE r.parentroute is null

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stopsroute_tmp1
AS
SELECT
    r.id as tms_opsroute_id
    ,r.name as tms_opsroute_name
    ,r.slug as tms_opsroute_slug
    ,r.parentroute as tms_opsroute_parentroute
    ,to_timestamp(r.insdate) as tms_opsroute_insdate
    ,to_timestamp(r.moddate) as tms_opsroute_moddate
    ,r.insby as tms_opsroute_insby
    ,r.status as tms_opsroute_status
    ,r.crossborder as tms_opsroute_crossborder
    ,r.roundtripdays as tms_opsroute_roundtripdays
    ,r.distance as tms_opsroute_distance
    ,r.duration as tms_opsroute_duration
    ,r.numofuse as tms_opsroute_numofuse
    ,r.legacyid as tms_opsroute_legacyid
    ,r.local as tms_opsroute_local

FROM publicroute r
WHERE r.parentroute is not null

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stopsroute_tmp2
AS
SELECT
    (r.id)*-1 as tms_opsroute_id
    ,upper(r.description) as tms_opsroute_name

FROM dbolh_routes r

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stdispatchactionlog
AS
SELECT

    id AS orv_dispatchactionlog_id,
	lat AS orv_dispatchactionlog_lat ,
	lng AS orv_dispatchactionlog_lng,
	reason AS orv_dispatchactionlog_reason,
	mode AS orv_dispatchactionlog_mode,
	to_timestamp(insdate) AS orv_dispatchactionlog_insdate,
	did AS orv_dispatchactionlog_did,
	action  AS orv_dispatchactionlog_action,
	uid  AS orv_dispatchactionlog_uid

	
FROM publicdispatchactionlog

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stlmsparcelweights
AS
SELECT
     b.tripid AS tms_lmsparcelweights_tripid
    ,l.bookingid AS tms_lmsparcelweights_bookingid
    ,l.loadid AS tms_lmsparcelweights_loadid
    ,t.parcelid AS tms_lmsparcelweights_parcelid
    ,t.weight AS tms_lmsparcelweights_weight
    ,t.chargeweight AS tms_lmsparcelweights_chargeweight
    ,t.volweight AS tms_lmsparcelweights_volweight
    ,t.volumiserweight AS tms_lmsparcelweights_volumiserweight
    ,c.name AS tms_lmsparcelweights_billbustomer

FROM publiclmsdata l
LEFT JOIN publicbooking b ON b.id = l.bookingid
LEFT JOIN ssttrackunion t ON t.loadid = l.loadid
LEFT JOIN dbocustomer c ON c.id = t.BillCustID

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stlmsbookingweights_tmp
AS
SELECT 

tms_lmsparcelweights_tripid as tms_lmsbookingweights_tripid
,tms_lmsparcelweights_bookingid as tms_lmsbookingweights_bookingid
,tms_lmsparcelweights_loadid as tms_lmsbookingweights_loadid
,tms_lmsparcelweights_billbustomer as tms_lmsbookingweights_billbustomer
,Sum(1) as tms_lmsbookingweights_noofparcels
,Sum(tms_lmsparcelweights_weight) as tms_lmsbookingweights_weight
,Sum(tms_lmsparcelweights_chargeweight) as tms_lmsbookingweights_chargeweight
,Sum(tms_lmsparcelweights_volweight) as tms_lmsbookingweights_volweight
,Sum(tms_lmsparcelweights_volumiserweight) as tms_lmsbookingweights_volumiserweight


FROM stlmsparcelweights 
GROUP BY 
tms_lmsparcelweights_tripid
,tms_lmsparcelweights_bookingid
,tms_lmsparcelweights_loadid
,tms_lmsparcelweights_billbustomer

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stlmsbookingweights
AS
SELECT
     t.tms_lmsbookingweights_tripid
    ,l.bookingid AS tms_lmsbookingweights_bookingid
    ,l.loadid AS tms_lmsbookingweights_loadid
    -- ,l.numprcls AS tms_lmsbookingweights_numprcls
    -- ,l.totalweight AS tms_lmsbookingweights_totalweight
    ,t.tms_lmsbookingweights_noofparcels
    ,t.tms_lmsbookingweights_weight
    ,t.tms_lmsbookingweights_chargeweight
    ,t.tms_lmsbookingweights_volweight
    ,t.tms_lmsbookingweights_volumiserweight
    ,t.tms_lmsbookingweights_billbustomer


FROM publiclmsdata l
LEFT JOIN stlmsbookingweights_tmp t ON t.tms_lmsbookingweights_bookingid||'|'||t.tms_lmsbookingweights_loadid = l.bookingid||'|'||l.loadid


UNION 


SELECT 
     b.tripid as tms_lmsbookingweights_tripid
    ,b.id as tms_lmsbookingweights_bookingid
    ,null as tms_lmsbookingweights_loadid
    ,null as tms_lmsbookingweights_noofparcels
    ,(b.billingquantity)*1000 as tms_lmsbookingweights_weight
    ,(b.billingquantity)*1000 as tms_lmsbookingweights_chargeweight
    ,null as tms_lmsbookingweights_volweight
    ,null as tms_lmsbookingweights_volumiserweight
    ,'FW LESA' as tms_lmsbookingweights_billbustomer


FROM publicbooking b
WHERE b.customerid = 184
AND b.billingmethod = 'unit_meter'
